name: DailyAffirmations
0: ”Alexa, get todays positive words for Logan from daily affirmations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily affirmations
des:
Do you want to set your kids up for success? If you do then continue reading.

Positive affirmations are phrases/beliefs used to challenge negative or unhelpful thoughts. As children learn behaviours and wire their brain, affirmations are very useful for developing a child's self belief. Every one of us has a strong belief system about the world and ourselves. This was learned from the environment around us. Positive words can help shape this belief system.

For example, if your affirmation is "when I fail, I say I can't do it YET, and try again", and you fail at something, the affirmation will trigger in your brain and remind you that you can do it, you just need to keep trying. Without this positive affirmation, you might think that if you fail at something then you can never do it and will just give up without trying again.

Simply ask Alexa to get todays positive words for your child. To hear the next word say 'next'
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
